channel.title: Services Available on University of North Texas: College of Visual Arts and Design
channel.description: Recent content in Services Available on University of North Texas: College of Visual Arts and Design

item.title: Research Consultation and Support
item.description: Faculty research and student exhbition support is available beginning on the Monday following the 12th class day each term. If you are faculty researcher and would like to request assistance with a research project, please submit a ticket and we can schedule a time to work with you. Please provide a detailed description of your project so we can prepare for the meeting in advance: include a project description, an expected timeline and information on the technology that will be part of the project. Contact us as early in the planning stages as possible so we can allocate sufficient time in our schedule to assist you.

item.title: Event and Exhibition Support
item.description: If you have an on-campus event planned, in one of our buildings or elsewhere on campus, we can provide event planning and support for the event. We need sufficient lead time to prepare. Contact us early so we can make sure the space(s) you require will be available. If you are hosting an event off-campus, please contact the CVAD Service Desk to inquire about available services.
